raw_body: At rest with Jesus. It is with deep sorrow that we announce the passing of MR. EDWARD GUNAWARDENA. Beloved husband to Marie (nee Seneviratne), cherished father to Prineetha and Prasantha, Edward will be fondly remembered by his son-in-law Sanjeeva Perera (Mario) and he was an adored grandfather to Rehan, Kishani and Sneha, he was a loving brother to late Clara, late Lucian, Lumina, late Sr. Francita (AC), Tennyson, late Regina, late Sr. Dhammika
